column1: Smoque BBQ////I stopped in at lunch time on a Tuesday and found nearly every chair filled with good
column2: solid northwest Chicago stock. The kind of guys who wear Haggar dress slacks
column4: and Bluetooth earpieces. The kind of guys who always "have a guy"...and their fathers
column5: the "guys" that other guys have. "Indipindint CANtrakerz."
